summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 RAM 1500. AFTER THE CONTACT'S WIFE PARKED THE VEHICLE, IT ROLLED OUT OF THE DRIVEWAY AND CRASHED INTO ANOTHER VEHICLE PARKED INSIDE THE NEIGHBOR'S GARAGE. PRIOR TO THE FAILURE, THE VEHICLE WAS IN PARK AND THE KEY WAS IN THE IGNITION WHILE THE ENGINE WAS RUNNING. THE CONTACT'S SPOUSE INJURED HER RIGHT WRIST AND LEFT KNEE WHILE ATTEMPTING TO STOP THE VEHICLE. MEDICAL ATTENTION WAS RECEIVED. A POLICE REPORT WAS NOT FILED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO DEMONTROND CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM (888 INTERSTATE 45 S, CONROE, TX 77304 (281) 528-1700) AND WAS AWAITING A DIAGNOSIS. THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THEY WOULD SEND INVESTIGATORS TO DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 17,837.
